requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2 cores 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 430 or Radeon 6450
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: AMD FX 8350 or Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280

results.name: (Released!) The Journey Of Rob The Robot
